00304 VL_INLINE void
00305 vl_dsift_transpose_descriptor (float* dst,
00306                               float const* src,
00307                               int numBinT,
00308                               int numBinX,
00309                               int numBinY)
00310 {
00311   int t, x, y ;
00312 
00313   for (y = 0 ; y < numBinY ; ++y) {
00314     for (x = 0 ; x < numBinX ; ++x) {
00315       int offset  = numBinT * (x + y * numBinX) ;
00316       int offsetT = numBinT * (y + x * numBinY) ;
00317 
00318       for (t = 0 ; t < numBinT ; ++t) {
00319         int tT = numBinT / 4 - t ;
00320         dst [offsetT + (tT + numBinT) % numBinT] = src [offset + t] ;
00321       }
00322     }
00323   }
00324 }
00325 
00332 void
00333 vl_dsift_set_window_size(VlDsiftFilter * self, double windowSize)
00334 {
00335   assert(windowSize >= 0.0) ;
00336   self->windowSize = windowSize ;
00337 }
00338 
00345 VL_INLINE double
00346 vl_dsift_get_window_size(VlDsiftFilter const * self)
00347 {
00348   return self->windowSize ;
00349 }
